text: ajeltm -ayha alqwm- ma tqwmwn bih min sqy alhjyj weimart almasjid alharam k'iyman man aman biallah walyawm alakhir wajahad fi sabil allh? la tatasawaa hal almuminin wahal alkafirin eind allh, li'ana allah la yaqbal eamalana bighayr al'iyman. wallah subhanah la yuafiq li'aemal alkhayr alqawm alzaalimin lanfshm balkfr
